page.title: 11Local Darts News
page.content: Twelve Stewartry darts players will be aiming for the record books next month in the hope of landing a local 24 hour points record. Their target is the 800,000 set in May last year by the Victoria Inn, Dumfries, and it is hoped the round the clock marathon will raise Â£1,000 for a hospital unit appeal. The nine men and three women from the Thistle Inn, Crossmichael, five of whom are members of the intercounty team, will play in groups of four with one hour on the board. One of the local darts players is ranked number 11 in Scotland and has played against the famous Jocky Wilson.
